original_text: When Jesus saw the crowd around him, he gave orders to cross to the other side of the lake.
korean_text: 예수께서 무리가 자기를 에워싸는 것을 보시고 건너편으로 가기를 명하시니라

sentences.original_text: When Jesus saw the crowd around him
sentences.korean_translation: 예수님께서 자기 주위에 모인 무리를 보셨을 때

sentences.original_text: he gave orders to cross to the other side
